product.name: Savvy Plus
product.shortDescription: Savvy Plus has all the benefits of the Savvy Bundle but because you use an ATM less than 4 times a month, it costs less.

features.name: Overdraft
features.shortDescription: Overdraft facility on a current account

features.name: My Pocket
features.shortDescription: Saving facility on a current account

features.name: Free Gold Cheque Card
features.shortDescription: Cheque Card that allows you to transact on your account

features.name: Free Cash withdrawal at participating Retailers
features.shortDescription: Free Cash withdrawal at participating Retailers

features.name: Self-service banking
features.shortDescription: Access your Nedbank accounts using your self-service banking profile; any time, any place, for FREE!

features.name: MyFinancialLife
features.shortDescription: An online personal financial management tool that assists you to monitor your spending, budget your money, keep track of your money and understand your spend patterns

features.name: Affinity Programmes
features.shortDescription: At no cost to you, through the Nedbank Affinity Programme you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children

features.name: No Funds Alert
features.shortDescription: Electronic notifications when you have insufficient funds for an attempted transaction

features.name: eNotes
features.shortDescription: Keep track of your finances with the eNote SMS notifications, anytime, anywhere. eNote keeps you informed about all transactions on your account.

features.name: Funeral Cover
features.shortDescription: The Nedbank Funeral cover provide cover that will help to secure a dignified funeral for yourself.
